reviews.title: Gift chips very short limit
reviews.comment: After update..  LOL.. it  says connection problem.. Couldn\'t connect Facebook user..   problem only for this game why not for all.. fix it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Extreme battery drainer on Sony Xperia L
reviews.comment: I don\'t know if it\'s the update or not but the power management app shows Zynga Poker consuming 58%. If this continues I\'ll be left with no choice but to uninstall this app, even though it\'s one of my favourites.
reviews.author: Imliwapang Jamir

reviews.title: Good game after fixes
reviews.comment: Had some problems but fixed. Good game
reviews.author: Samuel Larson

reviews.title: Very very  URGENT
reviews.comment: After update game won\'t work on either phone. It keeps saying there is a connection problem. Please fix asap.
reviews.author: Jarred Phy

reviews.title: Good fun.
reviews.comment: Wish it went faster and had a call/fold button and a sit out button
reviews.author: Jacob Higgins

reviews.title: Errors
reviews.comment: While playing in three dif. Tourneys at 100000 entry fee these past two weeks, i was atoumatically kicked out, and a screen popped up as if i lost stating ty u placed in 6 th. The second one ty u placed 7 th, the thrid said u placed 8th, servers were down when trying to contact them to see if i can get my chips back that they stole. . . .
reviews.author: Shane Conner

reviews.title: buggy but fun
reviews.comment: has a few bugs needed worked out. i have RAZR maxx and while playing sometimes my counter will continue counting down even after i picked a selection for what i want to do with my hand... also sometimes just randomly kicks you out of a tourney and says you finished in X place even if you were the chip leader...   this would be the best poker out there if it wasn\'t buggy
reviews.author: Brian Weyandt

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: Can\'t play after update.  Have a samsung s3.  Have restarted my phone and uninstalled and reinstalled.  Still not working!

reviews.title: Customer Support
reviews.comment: Was chip leader in Shootout game folded the hsnd before flop and it said I finished n 3rd. Sent a complaint to customer support.and they said there was no error. So looking for a new site now cause all I play is the shootous but not if I get gyped out.of my passes to 2nd round.
